audiogridder-by-andreas-pohl.author: Andreas Pohl
audiogridder-by-andreas-pohl.description: AudioGridder is a plugin host, that allows you to offload DSP processing to remote computers running OS X or Windows. This can come in handy when mixing complex projects for instance. AudioGridder comes with a plugin in AU/VST3 format and a server that supports VST2/VST3 and AudioUnit plugins to be hosted across the network. Simply run the server component on a remote machine and connect your DAW using the AudioGridder AU/VST3 plugin. This allows you to add remote insert chains or instruments into your DAW's signal paths. The DSP code of the loaded remote plugins will be executed on the remote machine and the remote plugin UI's will be streamed over the wire. With AudioGridder you get an experience very close to hosting the plugins directly in your DAW but not using your local CPU.
audiogridder-by-andreas-pohl.name: AudioGridder

brainworx-bx_subfilter-by-plugin-allianc.author: Plugin Alliance / Brainworx
brainworx-bx_subfilter-by-plugin-allianc.description: Polishing your mix's low end can be tricky. Bass DI tracks can sound mushy, and kick tracks can lose their "pop." Sometimes everything below 100Hz can become such an undifferentiated soup of noise that you just don't know where to start. Start here: The bx_subfilter is just the ticket for adding clarity and definition to tracks that have troublesome low frequencies. There are lots of expensive and complicated EQ plugins out there, but when it comes to shaping your low end, the bx_subfilter is unique for its ease and simplicity. With just a few quick adjustments to its four-knob interface, you can breathe new life into those 808s that have been muddying your mix.

classic-equalizer-by-ik-multimedia.description: T-RackS Classic Equalizer consists of a high quality six-band parametric EQ, specially designed to achieve high-end performance in a mastering environment. The T-RackS Classic Equalizer consists of a high quality six-band parametric EQ, specially designed to achieve high-end performance in a mastering environment. The design of this parametric EQ filter bands allows to perform broad EQing such as giving "air" to the high end, "fullness" to the low end or "focus" to the midrange of a mix with a nice and smooth result for creative and musical applications; when needed though, given its flexibility, this processor can be used very effectively to perform very precise interventions; considering the sharpness its peaking bands can reach, it makes it easy to remove a troublesome frequency without touching the rest of the spectrum.

clipshifter-2-by-lvc-audio.author: LVC-Audio
clipshifter-2-by-lvc-audio.description: ClipShifter is a wave-shaping clipping-style limiter that provides enough user controls to be useful in all mixing stages. ClipShifter uses a unique threshold control to change the clipping threshold dynamically based on the transient characteristics of the incoming audio. The sonic characteristics of the clipping distortion can be altered from hard, brickwall-style clipping, to softer saturation with compression. Additional parameters allow the user to control the even- and odd-order components of the saturation.
clipshifter-2-by-lvc-audio.name: ClipShifter 2

code-red-free-by-shattered-glass-audio.author: Shattered Glass Audio
code-red-free-by-shattered-glass-audio.description: Code Red Free is inspired by a classic, all tube, British console form the late 60s. The original console was known for its EQ, bold and punchy character, and the warmth it imparted. The Beatles recorded most of their material using this, and other versions of this console. Easily recognized overdriven sound of the Beatles' Revolution was created by chaining two preamps from this console.
code-red-free-by-shattered-glass-audio.name: Code Red Free

contra-free-by-audio-vitamins.author: Audio Vitamins
contra-free-by-audio-vitamins.description: A free version of the popular mixing comparison tool Contra.

convergence-free-by-cut-through-recordin.author: Cut Through Recordings
convergence-free-by-cut-through-recordin.description: Introducing the ultimate mastering tool. This versatile mastering compressor can handle even the most dynamic of tracks. Convergence features up to 10 bands of compression and as low as 2 bands. Does your track only need a 4 band compressor? No problem! It is trivial to add or remove bands and to adjust the crossover frequencies for them.
convergence-free-by-cut-through-recordin.name: Convergence (Free)

correlometer-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
correlometer-by-voxengo.description: Correlometer is an analog-style stereo multi-band correlation meter plug-in based on the correlation meter found in the PHA-979 phase-alignment plugin.
correlometer-by-voxengo.name: Correlometer

cottage-piano-lite-by-rdgaudio.author: RDGAudio
cottage-piano-lite-by-rdgaudio.description: Cottage Piano Lite is a new generation Piano software plugins developed by RDGAudio team. Now you can play your favorite songs right from your PC with just a MIDI keyboard. From Rock, Pop, House to modern EDM and Trance, Piano Cottage Lite helps you to make better music in less time.

creepy-piano-by-electronik-sound-lab.description: Creepy Piano is a free multi-sampled Rompler for Windows & Mac, with 22 spooky piano presets.

cx5m-v-by-digital-systemic-emulations.name: CX5M-V

cycle-lite-by-sample-fuel.author: Sample Fuel
cycle-lite-by-sample-fuel.description: Cycle-Lite is a sample based synth engine that houses 4 different sample layers with 24 different sample sources each. The engine cycles through each layer in order in tempo with the host/DAW. When the cycling is disabled, this instrument is capable to create thick and powerful 4 layer pads. The factory library includes over 35 professionally curate program presets.
cycle-lite-by-sample-fuel.name: Cycle-Lite

darksichord-by-electronik-sound-lab.author: Electronik Sound Lab
darksichord-by-electronik-sound-lab.description: Darksichord is a free plugin instrument for Windows & Mac. Darksichord featuring a multi-sampled Harpsichord, processed with several layers of sound and effects to give it a darker sound.
darksichord-by-electronik-sound-lab.name: Darksichord

dc1a-by-klanghelm.author: Klanghelm
dc1a-by-klanghelm.description: DC1A is the little brother of Klanghelm's upcoming compression monster DC8C. I've taken one of my favorite settings from DC8C and tried to make it work in a two control context. Soundwise it's comparable to the PUNCH mode in DC8C.
dc1a-by-klanghelm.name: DC1A

delay-bundle-by-soundhack.author: Soundhack
delay-bundle-by-soundhack.description: The Delay Bundle / Delay Kit is a collection of plugins that Tom Erbe (SoundHack) developed as class demonstrations while teaching computer music and studio technique at UC San Diego. All of these are derived from the same basic delay algorithm: a hermite interpolated delay line with variable modulation, and a feedback loop with dc blocking and saturation. Pitch shifting is achieved with a dual head crossfading delay (ala Eltro Tempophon/Dennis Gabor/Pierre Schaeffer phonogene) and is decidedly low-? The saturating feedback also allows them to be great drone and noise generators.
delay-bundle-by-soundhack.name: Delay Bundle

delay-by-stagecraft-software.author: Stagecraft Software
delay-by-stagecraft-software.description: A filter delay built from the ground up for EDM, focusing on overlapping quantized delays and allowing filter sweeps with a single parameter. Includes visual display with an astonishing high resolution FFT so you can literally see the effect of filters in real time, preset saving and sharing, and full automation for all parameters.
delay-by-stagecraft-software.name: Delay

devil-bass-module-by-devil-soundz.author: Devil Soundz
devil-bass-module-by-devil-soundz.description: Devil Bass Module is definitely what you want for creating the best bass tracks for your beats. Whether you want super low to Screaming high basses Devil Bass Module has you covered. Devil Bass Module has a lot of features including 3 oscillators. The first oscillator is for the low basses the second oscillator is for mid basses and the third oscillator is for high basses. Each oscillator has an on off switch so you can mix and match which oscillators are running depending on what kind of bass you want. The first oscillator has 22 waveforms including sine, triangle, saw, square and the other 18 are mixes of sine, triangle, saw and square for low basses. The second oscillator also has 22 waveforms which are sine doubled, triangle doubled, saw doubled and square doubled and 18 mixed waveforms of sine, triangle, saw and square but all of them are doubled to raise the frequency of oscillator 2 for mid basses. The third oscillator has 22 waveforms as well which are sine tripled, triangle tripled, saw tripled and square tripled and 18 mixed waveforms of sine, triangle, saw and square but are tippled to raise the frequency of oscillator 3 making it for high basses. Devil Bass Module also has a lot more to offer with features like 8 different lowpass filters which include LP 1, LP 2, 2 different 2 pole low pass filters, 2 different 6 pole low pass filters and 2 different 10 pole low pass filters. You can also set the filters base frequency. Which also plays a part in the cutoff frequency. Devil Bass Module also has a filter cutoff knob for changing the frequency. Which adjusting the frequency knob also plays a part for adjusting the tone also along with the base frequency too. The audio saturator removes unwanted artifacts like aliasing and distortions which can be set at Off, 2X, 4X, 6X and 8X. The higher you set it to the less aliasing and distortions you will have but it also raises the tone the higher you set the saturation. The vibes selector sets what kind of vibrations the bass will have. The lower the selection the further apart the vibrations will be and the higher the selection the closer the vibrations will be. But the higher you set the vibrations the higher the tone gets because the closer the vibrations are the faster the bass is traveling. The kick feature is there to add more of a kick at the beginning of the bass to add that extra kick to your bass. You can also add saturation to the bass with the saturation feature. Which with saturation smooths out the vibrations. The velocity feature adds more vibrations at a faster pace which happens whether you are making a low, mid, or high bass. Use the phat feature to smooth the vibrations of the bass if you want them to feel more vibrant. Devil Bass Module has a drawable adsr for the volume. Devil Bass Module also has a modulation matrix with 14 slots. The sources include (Sequencer Bi-Poler, Sequencer Positive, Synced LFO 1, Synced LFO 2, drawable modulation adsr 1 and drawable modulation adsr 2). The outputs include (oscillator 1 volume, oscillator 2 volume, oscillator 3 volume, oscillator 1 phase, oscillator 2 phase, oscillator 3 phase, tone, filter). The two LFO's are synced LFO's which also have depth knobs for mixing the Synced LFO's into the bass. The sequencer is a 16 step sequencer. The sequencer is made to re-trigger on every new note. The sequencer also has 8 templates pre-made. You can save new sequencer templates by selecting a template number making a sequence and then hit the save selector and the sequence will be saved in whatever number slot you would like and there are 8 savable slots. The drawable modulation adsr's also have a mix slider for mixing whatever target the drawable modulation adsr's are set to control. Devil bass module also has a 2 band EQ with pressure for setting the lows and mids. The lows and mids each have a selector for setting the frequency range of the lows and the mids and knobs to turn up the volume for the lows and mids. The pressure knob is for adding thickness or more thud power to the bass making the bass really pound. The pressure knob also has a selector for choosing the base pressure, You can have the base pressure set to 1X or 2X depending on how much pressure you want on the bass. Devil Bass Module has a tone knob for adjusting the tone of the bass. All three oscillators use the same tone knob to keep them synced. Devil Bass Module also has a master volume knob for adjusting the overall volume level. And just so you know where your volume level is at Devil Bass Module has a peak meter. So needless to say Devil Bass Module has so many features that can make all sorts of basses.
devil-bass-module-by-devil-soundz.name: Devil Bass Module

devil-by-devil-soundz.author: Devil Soundz
devil-by-devil-soundz.description: Devil is a two oscillator analog subtractive wave table synthesizer capable of producing a broad variety of instruments from throbbing rhythmic basses to really intriguing rhythmic leads. Devil has lots of features. Like 100 waveforms per oscillator for a wide variety of base tones right from the start. Then on the same dialog Devil also has a widener feature for widening the overall tone. Devil also has a spread feature for making the base tone sound more full and rich. Then you can click the properties switch to go into the properties tab of each oscillator. There you will find a curve switch for making waveform more curved which adds a little bit more depth to the tone. Then right next to it you will find an append switch for doubling the waveform to make the waveform a higher frequency. Also in Devil's properties tab there is a 2 band EQ where you can adjust how much lows and highs you want in your instrument. After that you will find a smooth highs feature to take out what highs you want out of the instrument leaving behind the tone you actually want. Also Devil has a saturation feature for adding a more sine like tone to your instrument which helps the lows and highs sound more smooth. The velocity feature in devil adds momentum to your instrument. From there we move on to the envelope tabs which you will find a drawable adsr for the volume and 2 drawable modulation envelopes to use with the modulation matrix. After that we get to Devil's filter which there is one per oscillator with a total of 9 different filters. The filters include LP 1, LP 2, LP 3, LP 4, HP 1, HP 2, HP 3 and 2 BP filters that can be adjusted by the cutoff knob which changes the overall tone and frequency of your instrument. Now from there you will find the next set of tabs that each of the two oscillators have. The first tab is the 16 step sequencer which you can use as a source in the modulation matrix if you need rhythm. The sequencer is set to reset and hit on every note. There is also a template selector for using pre-defined sequence patterns. You can also save your own sequence patterns to. To use this feature select a template number make the sequence you want and click save selector and select what number you want it saved to. Now every time you want to use that sequence again you just select that template number. There are 8 template slots that you can save sequences into till you decide on the final sequence that you want to use. The next tab is the LFO tab which there are two Synced LFO's for each oscillator which can be used as a source with the modulation matrix. Each Synced LFO also has a depth knob for mixing the Synced LFO into whatever target you use. The next tab is the modulation matrix which has 6 sources and 6 targets (sources include: Sequencer Bi-poler, Sequencer Positive, Synced LFO 1, Synced LFO 2, Modulation Envelope 1 and Modulation Envelope 2) (targets include: oscillator volume, oscillator phase, oscillator pitch, filter frequency, filter resonance and distortion). The next tab is Devil's basic wave shaper for having a little bit more control over the waveforms. You can use it to shape the waveform into a few different waveforms. Devil also has built in effects like distortion, stereo width, reverb and chorus, Devil has one master volume knob for adjusting the overall volume of the instrument. Devil also has a pitch knob for changing the overall tone of the instrument. The pitch controls both oscillators to keep them in sync. Devil also has a mix knob for mixing oscillators both oscillators moving the mix knob will either have oscillator 1 or oscillator 2 the more dominant instrument. Devil is great synthesizer and plus it's free. So go ahead and try it out. Devil Soundz hopes you will enjoy.
devil-by-devil-soundz.name: Devil

devil-drummr-by-devil-soundz.author: Devil Soundz
devil-drummr-by-devil-soundz.description: Devil Drummr is a drum sampler that loads 16-bit WAV files and has 11 parts. One part for each of bass, kick, snare, tom low, tom high, hi hat, cymbal and clap. Devil Drummr also has three extra parts for adding different instruments whether it be a triangle, bell, conga, shaker or sound fx or whatever you want in your drum track. Devil Drummr has knobs to edit the volume, pitch and phatness. The phat feature adds extra flare and smoothness to the WAV sample you have loaded. Devil Drummr also has a reverb effect.
devil-drummr-by-devil-soundz.name: Devil Drummr

devil-reverb-by-devil-soundz.author: Devil Soundz
devil-reverb-by-devil-soundz.description: Devil Reverb is a great sounding reverb for adding that extra melody and warmth to your instrument. Devil Reverb is relatively straight forward and simple to use. Use the reverb knob for adding reverb, Use the width knob for adding stereo width to your reverb making the reverb sound more full and harmonic. Use the low frequency knob for adjusting the low end frequency of the reverb. Use the high frequency knob for adjusting the high end frequency of the reverb. Adjusting the low and high frequencies sets the reverb frequency range. Use the base frequency knob for adjusting the base frequency of the reverb. The frequency range and the base frequency work together. The frequency range sets the range of the reverb and the base frequency sets the starting frequency of the reverb within the frequency range. The frequency q knob for adjusting the frequency q of the reverb. Which adds a little high frequency to the reverb for getting the extra harmonics. The reverb frequency selector is for setting what frequency the reverb starts at. Which works together with the frequency range and base frequency. So the reverb frequency is the starting frequency. The frequency range sets the range with the reverb frequency in the middle of the range. And the base frequency adjusts the reverb frequency up or down a bit. So basically it's all to fine tune the reverb frequency. Devil Reverb will definitely sound great on whatever instrument you put it on.
devil-reverb-by-devil-soundz.name: Devil Reverb

devil-vocal-processor-by-devil-soundz.author: Devil Soundz
devil-vocal-processor-by-devil-soundz.description: Devil Vocal Processor is for making your vocal tracks sound like you recorded your vocals in a professional studio even if you didn't record them in a professional studio. Devil Vocal Processor is meant for people who don't have a professional recording studio but want professional results. Devil Vocal Processor is there to bring out the heart of your vocals while maintaining the qualities of your voice by giving them the right amount of harmonics and giving your vocals a professional studio quality feel.
devil-vocal-processor-by-devil-soundz.name: Devil Vocal Processor

digiverb-by-mb-audio-lab.author: MB Audio Lab
digiverb-by-mb-audio-lab.description: MB Audio Lab DigiVerb is a free reverb plug-in.

fa-sampledelay-by-forward-audio.author: forward audio
fa-sampledelay-by-forward-audio.description: fa SampleDelay is a simple, but powerful effect Plugin for small phase alignment tasks in guitar, drum or vocal recordings. It's main purpose is to solve time differences occurring in multi microphone setups and furthermore reduce horrible sounding comb filter effects (often called phase issues). Nevertheless, you can also apply interesting haas delay effects, compensate plugin latencies introduced by other Plugins or intentionally create comb filter effects to create colorful filter textures:

Free Piano comes with Staccato and Auto Sustain Instruments presets. 3 layers of Sounds Piano+ Strings+Pad with Gain controllers. Velocity sensitive and Round Robing Sampling. The Piano has been recorded with 4 Mic pos. ADSR, Low Pass Filter, Tuning, Reverb, Amp and Level Meter.
free-piano-by-rdgaudio.name: Free Piano

midi-quest-by-sound-quest.description: MIDI Quest, the multi-instrument MIDI editor/librarian, is available in three versions: MIDI Quest, MIDI Quest Pro, and MIDI Quest Essentials to complement your studio's requirements. A version for iPad is also available.
midi-quest-by-sound-quest.name: Midi Quest

midside-matrix-by-goodhertz.author: Goodhertz
midside-matrix-by-goodhertz.description: Midside Matrix pares down our acclaimed mid/side processor, Midside, to just the essentials: mid/side matrixing, gains, monitoring, & metering — all in a simple, lightweight package. And, because we love M/S processing so much at Goodhertz, we decided to make Midside Matrix free for everyone.
midside-matrix-by-goodhertz.name: Midside Matrix

minimal-clock-by-minimal-instruments.author: Minimal Instruments
minimal-clock-by-minimal-instruments.description: Minimal Clock is a clock ticking sound sampler.
minimal-clock-by-minimal-instruments.name: Minimal Clock

minusdelay-by-bakuage.author: Bakuage
minusdelay-by-bakuage.description: MinusDelay is VST3 delay plugin that can set a negative delay value. Normal delay plugins can delay the sound, but MinusDelay can bring forward the sound. It is based on "Delay Compensation" feature of DAW.
minusdelay-by-bakuage.name: MinusDelay

mjuc-jr-by-klanghelm.author: Klanghelm
mjuc-jr-by-klanghelm.description: MJUC jr. is the little brother of the colorful MJUC.
mjuc-jr-by-klanghelm.name: MJUC jr.

mloudnessanalyzer-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mloudnessanalyzer-by-meldaproduction.description: MLoudnessAnalyzer is an ITU-R BS.1770-1 and EBU 3341 compliant loudness meter. It contains a peak meter, momentary, short-term and integrated loudness meters and a loudness range meter. Supports EBU+9, EBU+18 and EBU+27 scales:
mloudnessanalyzer-by-meldaproduction.name: MLoudnessAnalyzer

mnoisegenerator-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mnoisegenerator-by-meldaproduction.description: MNoiseGenerator is a simple noise generator. It can be used as a testing generator for analyses or, thanks to the integrated modulators, for some creative effects:
mnoisegenerator-by-meldaproduction.name: MNoiseGenerator

mnotepad-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mnotepad-by-meldaproduction.description: MNotepad is a simple text editor. It doesn't perform any audio processing, but you can use it to store comments, lyrics or just any text.
mnotepad-by-meldaproduction.name: MNotepad

mono-repeater-by-tilt-audio.author: Tilt Audio
mono-repeater-by-tilt-audio.description: Mono Repeater is a classic digital delay simulation of an analog tape delay. The application was designed and written by Tilt Audio, a moniker of Akash Murthy, an audiophile and enthusiast. The sleek interface helps the user dial in the perfect delay, ranging from a subtle ambient reverb effect, to full blown in-your-face echo box. It is mainly intended to be used as a plugin within a host, and boasts a wide range of tempo selection option to dial in the perfect delay time setting when recording or playing to a click track.
mono-repeater-by-tilt-audio.name: Mono Repeater

moody-sampler-by-soundslates.author: Soundslates
moody-sampler-by-soundslates.description: Moody is a versatile and easy to use sample player, integrated to the Soundslates collaboration platform.
moody-sampler-by-soundslates.name: Moody Sampler

moscillator-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
moscillator-by-meldaproduction.description: MOscillator is an anti-aliased generator plugin with adjustable oscillator shape. It can be used as a testing generator for analyses or for more advanced effects such as sub-bass enhancement:
moscillator-by-meldaproduction.name: MOscillator

mouthin-off-by-reflekt-audio.author: Reflekt Audio
mouthin-off-by-reflekt-audio.description: The Mouthin' Off plugin was designed by Daniel of ReflektAudio.
mouthin-off-by-reflekt-audio.name: Mouthin Off

mphaser-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mphaser-by-meldaproduction.description: MPhaser is a traditional phasing effect plugin.
mphaser-by-meldaproduction.name: MPhaser

mratio-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mratio-by-meldaproduction.description: MRatio is a single utility that lets you crossfade between the main input and sidechain. Its 2 modulators however open up a whole set of creative possibilities.
mratio-by-meldaproduction.name: MRatio

mratiomb-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mratiomb-by-meldaproduction.description: MRatioMB lets you crossfade between main input and sidechain in up to 6 bands, splitted using frequency, level, stereo, transient/tonal and other crossovers.
mratiomb-by-meldaproduction.name: MRatioMB

mrecorder-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mrecorder-by-meldaproduction.description: MRecorder is a simple utility for a simple job - record the plugin input into a WAV file. It may not be necesary every day, but it is good to have it when you need it.
mrecorder-by-meldaproduction.name: MRecorder

mringmodulator-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mringmodulator-by-meldaproduction.description: MRingModulator performs standard ring-modulation effect using two oscillators.
mringmodulator-by-meldaproduction.name: MRingModulator

msaturator-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
msaturator-by-meldaproduction.description: MSaturator performs smooth saturation in a definitive tube-like way improving the clarity of the resulting sound. Its excellent sound quality makes it flexible enough to double as a distortion module for guitars and other instruments.
msaturator-by-meldaproduction.name: MSaturator

mscontrol-by-tekit.author: Tek'it Audio
mscontrol-by-tekit.description: MScontrol is a professional Mid/Side control utility plug-in. MScontrol offers stereo signal encoding into mid­-side signal, decoding of mid­-side signal into stereo signal and "onboard" mode to adjust the mid/side channels gain, panning and flip the phase without the need of using two plug­in instances.
mscontrol-by-tekit.name: MScontrol

msdevil-by-beatassist-eu.author: beatassist.eu
msdevil-by-beatassist-eu.description: MSDevil is a plugin effect that makes part of a pack/bundle of plugin effects that is being created by beatassist.eu.
msdevil-by-beatassist-eu.name: MSDevil

msed-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
msed-by-voxengo.description: MSED is a mid/side encoder/decoder plug-in which encodes (splits) the incoming stereo signal into two components: mid/side or, alternatively, mono/stereo pair, and vice versa: decodes mid/side signal pair into stereo signal.
msed-by-voxengo.name: MSED

mstereoexpander-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mstereoexpander-by-meldaproduction.description: MStereoExpander provides stereo field modification to improve clarity and/or reduce differences between channels.
mstereoexpander-by-meldaproduction.name: MStereoExpander

mtremolo-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mtremolo-by-meldaproduction.description: MTremolo is a traditional tremolo with adjustable shape:
mtremolo-by-meldaproduction.name: MTremolo

mtuner-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mtuner-by-meldaproduction.description: MTuner is a powerful frequency analyzer designed mostly for tuning guitars and other instruments. It features a classic monophonic tuner as well as a high resolution polyphonic tuner which tremendously speeds up tuning guitars and basses.
mtuner-by-meldaproduction.name: MTuner

multi-drummer-by-freemusicproduction-net.author: Freemusicproduction.net
multi-drummer-by-freemusicproduction-net.description: Multi Drummer: free (donation) drum (sound) designer, editor, mixer and player includes:
multi-drummer-by-freemusicproduction-net.name: Multi Drummer

multidrive-pedal-pro-le-by-audified.author: Audified
multidrive-pedal-pro-le-by-audified.description: Multidrive Pedal Pro Le - "Stomp it down to kick it up" Sharpen your sound with the legendary overdrive
multidrive-pedal-pro-le-by-audified.name: MultiDrive Pedal Pro LE

multiply-by-acon-digital.author: Acon Digital
multiply-by-acon-digital.description: Acon Digital Multiply is a free and versatile chorus effect with a unique twist. Each simulated voice is processed with a phase randomizing filter so that unpleasant comb filter effects are avoided. The effect can be used to simulate the effect of several performers playing the same tones simultaneously, to widen the spatial image or to create special effects for sound design. Multiply can simulate up to 6 additional voices and both the pitch and the loudness of the voices can be modulated. There is also an integrated equalizer consisting of low cut, low shelf, high shelf and high cut filters that can be applied to the effect signal. An integrated pre-delay section makes it possible to create modulated and diffuse echo effects.
multiply-by-acon-digital.name: Multiply

multitrackstudio-by-bremmers-audio-desig.author: Bremmers Audio Design
multitrackstudio-by-bremmers-audio-desig.description: MultitrackStudio is audio/MIDI multitrack recording software for Windows. It combines a multitrack recorder, a mixer, lots of effects and a MIDI sequencer in one package: everything that's needed to turn your computer into a digital multitrack music recording studio.
multitrackstudio-by-bremmers-audio-desig.name: MultitrackStudio

muteomatic-by-sound-radix.author: Sound Radix
muteomatic-by-sound-radix.description: Muteomatic is an elegant and simple plug-in that automates the activation of a talkback or listen microphone channel according to your DAW's transport state and boldly displays the channel's activation status.
muteomatic-by-sound-radix.name: Muteomatic

mutility-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mutility-by-meldaproduction.description: MUtility is an effect providing many elementary actions often useful by every engineer as well as more scientific features. This consists of volume, panorama, phase inversion, stereo swapping, DC blocker, delay in samples and milliseconds, RMS and envelope, a few mathematical functions, expression evaluator and mono-stereo (de)encoder.
mutility-by-meldaproduction.name: MUtility

mvibrato-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mvibrato-by-meldaproduction.description: MVibrato is a traditional vibrato with adjustable shape:
mvibrato-by-meldaproduction.name: MVibrato

mvmeter2-by-tbproaudio.author: TBProAudio
mvmeter2-by-tbproaudio.description: mvMeter2 is a multi-variable meter including RMS, EBUR128, VU and PPM measurement. mvMeter2 is the successor of mvMeter and adds single/dual meter display, adjustable reference level for all meter modes, adjustable meter delay and preset management.
mvmeter2-by-tbproaudio.name: mvMeter2

mwaveshaper-by-meldaproduction.author: MeldaProduction
mwaveshaper-by-meldaproduction.description: MWaveShaper is a traditional wave-shaping plug-in. Unlike other plug-ins it has an adjustable shape instead of a few predefined shapes.
mwaveshaper-by-meldaproduction.name: MWaveShaper

n4-player-by-acustica-audio.author: Acustica Audio
n4-player-by-acustica-audio.description: Acustica Audio is pleased to announce the free N4 Player. N4 Player supersedes the previously available N4 free which is now obsolete and no longer available. N4 Player is here to offer to all customers important new features and improvements. N4 Player is a multi-effect plug-in able to emulate a wide range of audio equipment and other electrical, digital or acoustic audio systems, providing a true sonic alternative to costly and bulky hardware and opening new paths to creative uses and highly realistic sounds. N4 Player loads libraries or entire plug-ins, all created by using a sophisticated state-of-the-art dynamic sampling approach and an engine based on Volterra series nonlinear convolution.
n4-player-by-acustica-audio.name: N4 Player

na-analog-rack-chorus-by-nembrini-audio.author: Nembrini Audio
na-analog-rack-chorus-by-nembrini-audio.description: The Analog Rack Chorus plugin is a very simple but powerful chorus plugin inspired by the most famous Chorus pedals and rack effect units.
na-analog-rack-chorus-by-nembrini-audio.name: NA Analog Rack Chorus

na-analog-rack-cleaner-by-nembrini-audio.author: Nembrini Audio
na-analog-rack-cleaner-by-nembrini-audio.description: The Analog Rack Cleaner plugin is high pass and low pass filters in a single rack Fx plugin to clear up low-end rumble and high frequency noise.
na-analog-rack-cleaner-by-nembrini-audio.name: NA Analog Rack Cleaner

na-analog-rack-delay-by-nembrini-audio.author: Nembrini Audio
na-analog-rack-delay-by-nembrini-audio.description: The Analog Rack Delay plugin is the power of Nembrini Audio's delay algorithms in a simple package! BPM Sync, stereo spread circuit and a very juicy sound.
na-analog-rack-delay-by-nembrini-audio.name: NA Analog Rack Delay

na-analog-rack-noise-gate-by-nembrini-au.author: Nembrini Audio
na-analog-rack-noise-gate-by-nembrini-au.description: The Analog Rack Noise Gate plugin is a very simple but powerful noise gate plugin especially tuned for guitar and bass.
na-analog-rack-noise-gate-by-nembrini-au.name: NA Analog Rack Noise Gate

na-crunck-v2-guitar-amplifier-by-nembrin.author: Nembrini Audio
na-crunck-v2-guitar-amplifier-by-nembrin.description: The Crunck V2 Guitar Amplifier is one channel free plugin designed for a wide range of music genre.
na-crunck-v2-guitar-amplifier-by-nembrin.name: NA Crunck V2 Guitar Amplifier

nadir-by-ignite-amps.author: Ignite Amps
nadir-by-ignite-amps.description: NadIR is a zero latency, dual Impulse Response (IR) convolver, designed to be used as a cabinet simulator for guitar and bass (pre)amplifiers (VST/AU or even hardware).
nadir-by-ignite-amps.name: NadIR

neutrino-by-izotope-inc.author: iZotope
neutrino-by-izotope-inc.description: Neutrino is a free spectral shaping plug-in for Mac OS X and Windows.
neutrino-by-izotope-inc.name: Neutrino

noize-retro-by-denise.author: denise
noize-retro-by-denise.description: The Noize Retro is slimmed down limited edition version of the Noize 2 plugin from denise audio. It features one unique adaptive noise type modeled after the noise produced by old-school arcade system boards, used for many popular arcade games since the 70s.
noize-retro-by-denise.name: Noize Retro

nord-lead-a1-vst-editor-plugin-standalon.author: Ctnr Audio
nord-lead-a1-vst-editor-plugin-standalon.description: You can fully control your Nord Lead remotely with this plugin, automation functions for MIDI parameters can be used via DAW softwares.
nord-lead-a1-vst-editor-plugin-standalon.name: Nord Lead A1 VST Editor Plugin, Standalone App
tags: Midi Editor for Nord Lead A1

nrr-1-by-ignite-amps.author: Ignite Amps
nrr-1-by-ignite-amps.description: NRR-1 is a digital emulation of a three channels tube preamplifier for guitar. It has been developed to accurately model its real hardware counterpart, built for Fleshgod Apocalypse guitarist Cristiano Trionfera by Ignite Amps, back in 2009.
nrr-1-by-ignite-amps.name: NRR-1

nuspin-basic-player-by-nuvibrations.author: nuVibrations
nuspin-basic-player-by-nuvibrations.description: The nuSpin Basic Player allows you to play sounds created by the full version of nuSpin. You can also play add-on content designed for the full player. nuSpin basic player also lets you explore some of the wavetable and program creation features of the full version including image to sound conversion, subtractive synthesis and plucked-string synthesis. The free version includes 69 sounds.
nuspin-basic-player-by-nuvibrations.name: nuSpin Basic Player

oberom-by-samplescience.author: SampleScience
oberom-by-samplescience.description: Oberom is a sampled version of Oberon by Land of Cockaigne, a VST plugin that is an attempt to imitate the classic analog polysynths. With its thick 2-pole dual filter, it's sound is reminiscent of the Arp 2600.
oberom-by-samplescience.name: Oberom

oldskoolverb-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
oldskoolverb-by-voxengo.description: OldSkoolVerb is a freeware algorithmic reverberation AU and VST plug-in for professional music production applications. This plug-in implements a kind of "classic" stereo reverb algorithm which is technically simple yet optimal. It also produces a very clear spatial image that blends well with the mix.
oldskoolverb-by-voxengo.name: OldSkoolVerb

orilriver-by-denis-tihanov.author: Denis Tihanov
orilriver-by-denis-tihanov.description: OrilRiver is a free algorithmic stereo reverb that can rival the quality of commercial reverbs. With this plugin it is possible to simulate the reverberation of a small room and great hall. OrilRiver has an intuitive interface thanks to which the user can quickly adjust the desired reverb sound.
orilriver-by-denis-tihanov.name: OrilRiver

ou-80-by-reflekt-audio.author: Reflekt Audio
ou-80-by-reflekt-audio.description: OU-80 is a free drum plug-in that comes packed with over 100 knocking drum sounds. Equipped with a simple but effective user interface, it wont be hard to find your next drum element.
ou-80-by-reflekt-audio.name: OU-80

overtone-geq-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
overtone-geq-by-voxengo.description: Overtone GEQ was designed to be a quick EQ shape adjustment tool for mixes and sub-mixes. During its operation, Overtone GEQ applies harmonic enhancement processing that delivers a special touch and shine to the sound.
overtone-geq-by-voxengo.name: Overtone GEQ

ozone-imager-by-izotope-inc.author: iZotope
ozone-imager-by-izotope-inc.description: Ozone Imager is a free stereo imaging plug-in for your DAW or NLE.
ozone-imager-by-izotope-inc.name: Ozone Imager

p-moneyy-machine-by-synthiv.author: SynthIV
p-moneyy-machine-by-synthiv.description: This plugin is a celebration of rapper P-Moneyy. Press any key to trigger a sample of him saying his own name, just like on his debut album "71065". This is a free plugin! Enjoy.
p-moneyy-machine-by-synthiv.name: P-Moneyy Machine

padspheres-by-laptop-musician-blog.author: Laptop Musician Blog
padspheres-by-laptop-musician-blog.description: Padspheres is a little collection of 25 pads and atmospheres (hence its name) embedded in a plugin instrument. Use it as an inspiration igniter or to create big atmospheric pad chords. All the sounds in the plugin have a very space tone to them.
padspheres-by-laptop-musician-blog.name: Padspheres

panagement-by-auburn-sounds.author: Auburn Sounds
panagement-by-auburn-sounds.description: Panagement is a spatialization powerhouse that lets you control the stereo space with extreme ease.
panagement-by-auburn-sounds.name: Panagement

panipulator-by-boz-digital-labs.author: Boz Digital Labs
panipulator-by-boz-digital-labs.description: Panipulator gives you four simple controls to let you quickly check your mix in different mono configurations. If you ever plan on your mixes being played beyond your own studio, it's almost guaranteed that it will play through a system that is configured incorrectly. Panipulator lets you hear what your mix will sound like on these systems and catch the issues that may be hiding in your stereo mix before it is released to the public.
panipulator-by-boz-digital-labs.name: Panipulator

pastoral-tones-light-by-samplescience.author: SampleScience
pastoral-tones-light-by-samplescience.description: Pastoral Tones Light is a 5 sounds free version of Pastoral Tones.
pastoral-tones-light-by-samplescience.name: Pastoral Tones Light

phreephuzz-by-lvc-audio.author: LVC-Audio
phreephuzz-by-lvc-audio.description: PhreePhuzz is a saturation plugin pure and simple. Although the controls are very simple to use, PhreePhuzz utilizes many underlying technologies used to create LVC-Audio's PreAMPed, Toned, TonedPLUS and HotPhuzz plugins. PhreePhuzz has six distinct saturation settings. Each of these settings utilizes a distinctly-tuned multiband saturation algorithm. All internal processing occurs using 4x oversampling to reduce the aliasing effects of saturation.
phreephuzz-by-lvc-audio.name: PhreePhuzz

pitcheddelay-by-lkjb.author: lkjb
pitcheddelay-by-lkjb.description: PitchedDelay is a delay that allows the pitching the delayed signal. This can be done within or outside the feedback loop.
pitcheddelay-by-lkjb.name: PitchedDelay

plasticityfilter-by-bom-shanka-machines.author: Bom Shanka Machines
plasticityfilter-by-bom-shanka-machines.description: plasticityFilter is a dual mode filter offering a simplified interface to its high and low pass filters or a more complex mode of operation allowing complete independent control:
plasticityfilter-by-bom-shanka-machines.name: plasticityFilter

playtime-by-reflekt-audio.author: Reflekt Audio
playtime-by-reflekt-audio.description: The Playtime VST Plugin is a VST plugin instrument for Windows & Mac. Playtime was developed by myself Daniel of @ReflektAudio and I created this VST plugin out of toys. As shown in my instagram video I sampled a toy banjo, toy keyboard, some toy drums and a toy ukulele. I sampled these toy instruments with professional precision to bring you all a unique sounding plugin. Playtime is equipped with HQ multi blend-able microphones, essential on board effect parameters and a sick graphic user interface. The sounds within the Playtime VST plugin came from toys but the sound is very raw and unique to it's own. The toy banjo and the toy ukulele both have 3 blend-able microphone layers. The toy piano and the toy drums have 6 different blend-able microphone layers. This allows us to blend the different microphones together creating one full sound:
playtime-by-reflekt-audio.name: Playtime

podolski-by-u-he.author: u-he
podolski-by-u-he.description: Podolski is a simple, CPU-efficient virtual analogue synth. A cut down version of FilterscapeVA with just one oscillator, one filter, one envelope and two LFOs, it also features a Zebra-style arpeggiator/sequencer and chorus/delay effects.
podolski-by-u-he.name: Podolski

poly-lite-by-sample-fuel.author: Sample Fuel
poly-lite-by-sample-fuel.description: Poly-Lite is a stream lined version of Sample Fuel's product, Poly. A few select features have been disabled in Poly-Lite compared to the Full Version of Poly, but it is still incredibly capable.
poly-lite-by-sample-fuel.name: Poly-Lite

pop-sound-shaper-by-cut-through-recordin.author: Cut Through Recordings
pop-sound-shaper-by-cut-through-recordin.description: Introducing POP, the all new dynamics Plug-in from Cut Through Recordings. POP is designed with one goal in mind: give your tracks the pop that they have been missing. POP Sound Shaper is a compressor/clipper combo. It is also great for getting more control over the dynamic range of your track without losing its transients. The compressor is designed to bring out the transients of the signal. It does this by having attack and release times set to let the transients pass and then immediately clamp down on the signal. These times are locked in to make using POP as simple as possible. Set the Amount of compression and set the threshold and you're done. The compressor is followed by a soft clipper just incase you want to trim some of the higher peaks. POP also features two tone controls "Thump" and "Air" which are also dialed in to help make your tracks pop.
pop-sound-shaper-by-cut-through-recordin.name: POP Sound Shaper

powershaper-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
powershaper-by-voxengo.description: Powershaper is a saturation, distortion and overdrive effect plugin for professional music production applications. Powershaper's approach to saturation is unique as it works in multi-stage manner utilizing dozens of saturation stages in a specified variation. While Powershaper was designed to apply extreme saturation, it can be also used to boost presence of audio tracks subtly.
powershaper-by-voxengo.name: Powershaper

primer-by-audible-genius.author: Audible Genius
primer-by-audible-genius.description: Primer is a synth equipped with the most essential controls and nothing more. Created by Audible Genius, it is an exact replica of the synth used in their flagship synthesizer training app, Syntorial. As such, Primer contains the most common controls found on most subtractive/analogue synths, allowing for a wide variety of patches and sounds, while presenting a simple and easy-to-understand interface and layout.
primer-by-audible-genius.name: Primer

prof-e-t-by-ignite-amps.author: Ignite Amps
prof-e-t-by-ignite-amps.description: ProF.E.T. is a digital emulation of an high gain distortion preamp/stomp-box for guitar. It has been developed to accurately model its real hardware counterpart, designed and built by Ignite Amps in 2018.
prof-e-t-by-ignite-amps.name: ProF.E.T.

prometer-by-bakuage.author: Bakuage
prometer-by-bakuage.description: ProMeter is a VST Analyzer plug-in that measures "professionality". "Professionality" is an index that shows how close it is to professional sound (sound of commercially CD). It is calculated based on the learning result of the actual commercial CD. Originally it was an indicator that can be measured with AI Mastering an automated online mastering service. In order to approach professional sound in the mixing stage, we made it possible to measure "professionality" in real time with VST.
prometer-by-bakuage.name: ProMeter

pteq-x-by-ignite-amps.author: Ignite Amps
pteq-x-by-ignite-amps.description: PTEq-X is a digital emulation of 3 famous vintage passive program equalizers.
pteq-x-by-ignite-amps.name: PTEq-X

punish-by-heavyocity.author: Heavyocity
punish-by-heavyocity.description: From subtle warmth to extreme drive and compression, PUNISH injects character and edge into any mix or instrument track. It's the same PUNISH effect that you know and love, as featured in Heavyocity's award-winning line of virtual instruments, now in VST/AU/AAX plugin format. Modeled after Heavyocity's custom analog signal chains, PUNISH gives you control over Compression, Saturation, Transients, EQ, and Limiting. Chain the modules together to get that signature PUNISH sound, or isolate them to experience each dynamic effect on its own.
punish-by-heavyocity.name: Punish

qontrolr-by-sound-base-audio-llc.author: Sound-Base Audio
qontrolr-by-sound-base-audio-llc.description: Qontrolr is a quality control plug-in for Windows as both a 64 and 32-bit VST/VST3 technology. It features clipping distortion, decimation, fuzz, and static effects. It is intended to be used to create a lo-fi effect on either an entire track or a single instrument.
qontrolr-by-sound-base-audio-llc.name: Qontrolr

qrange-by-lkjb.author: lkjb
qrange-by-lkjb.description: lkjb QRange is a IIR linear phase EQ with the following features:
qrange-by-lkjb.name: QRange

qtractor-by-rncbc.author: rncbc
qtractor-by-rncbc.description: Qtractor is an audio/MIDI multi-track sequencer application written in C++ with the Qt framework. Target platform is Linux, where the Jack Audio Connection Kit (JACK) for audio and the Advanced Linux Sound Architecture (ALSA) for MIDI are the main infrastructures to evolve as a fairly-featured Linux desktop audio workstation GUI, specially dedicated to the personal home-studio.
qtractor-by-rncbc.name: Qtractor

quiet-piano-by-quiet-music.author: Quiet Music
quiet-piano-by-quiet-music.description: Quiet Piano is a free VST3/VST/AU Grand Piano, specially designed to create Relaxing Music, Meditation Music or Ambient Music, available for Windows and Mac.
quiet-piano-by-quiet-music.name: Quiet Piano

raijin-by-minimal-instruments.author: Minimal Instruments
raijin-by-minimal-instruments.description: Raijin is an EDM oriented drum pad rompler plugin. It is simple yet useful drum tool for music producers.
raijin-by-minimal-instruments.name: Raijin

rain-maker-by-quiet-music.author: Quiet Music
rain-maker-by-quiet-music.description: Rain Maker is a free VST3 / VST / AU plugin for Windows and Mac. Generate continuous sound of rain and thunder for your audiovisual productions or for any musical production.
rain-maker-by-quiet-music.name: Rain Maker

refine-by-lkjb.author: lkjb
refine-by-lkjb.description: ReFine is a plugin that allows to add a final polishing to your tracks, busses and masters. It extracts psycho-acoustic parameters from the source and thus allows to add warmth, space and punch to your mixes. This is done level dependent and rather subtle; you probably won't be able to create heavy distortion effects with this plugin.
refine-by-lkjb.name: ReFine

reggae-drums-by-freemusicproduction-net.author: Freemusicproduction.net
reggae-drums-by-freemusicproduction-net.description: Hip Hop Drums - Player - Drum Designer - Drumset for HAlion Sonic SE, HALion Sonic, HALion includes:
reggae-drums-by-freemusicproduction-net.name: Reggae Drums

resom-by-wok.author: WOK
resom-by-wok.description: RESOM is a free resonator audio effect.
resom-by-wok.name: RESOM

resonance-by-samplescience.author: SampleScience
resonance-by-samplescience.description: Resonance is a piano plugin designed by combining short acoustic piano attack samples and a piano's body resonance physical model. Inspired by the music of Nils Frahm, Resonance is perfect for fast arpeggios and emotional riffs. Full of beautiful imperfections, rich tones, and subtleties, Resonance will be an essential part of your arsenal. Best of all, Resonance is completely free.
resonance-by-samplescience.name: Resonance

ritmix-drum-machine-by-soundbridge.author: SoundBridge
ritmix-drum-machine-by-soundbridge.description: RitMix is a powerful drum machine containing a 16-step sequencer, MPC-style pad performance section, extensive editing capabilities, and a solid built-in mixer. It consolidates the most essential functionality needed to make complex rhythms on-the-fly and plenty of insert FX, humanizers, and randomization algorithms.
ritmix-drum-machine-by-soundbridge.name: RitMix: Drum Machine

riviera-hyper-room-reverb-by-nuspace-aud.author: NuSpace Audio
riviera-hyper-room-reverb-by-nuspace-aud.description: Riviera is a free hybrid algorithmic-convolution reverb plugin for modeling specular acoustic reflections in N-dimensional orthotopes. e.g. string, plate, room, tesseract, and up (vooms or volume+room for short). Normally, direct computations in these spaces are expensive but some clever maths reduced the asymptotic costs to the point of practical use (e.g. a Reverb plugin). Parameterizing these spaces and then combining them with some fast time-varying frequency decay resulted in some interesting sounding impulse responses (IRs).
riviera-hyper-room-reverb-by-nuspace-aud.name: Riviera: Hyper-Room Reverb

roboverb-by-kushview.author: Kushview
roboverb-by-kushview.description: Kushview's Roboverb is a one of a kind plugin unlike any other reverb, intended to allow you to stand out in a crowd. Equipped with versatility to replace your current "go-to" reverb, Roboverb also offers a set of switches capable of flipping your project on it's ear.
roboverb-by-kushview.name: Roboverb

rockamp-by-linda-audio.author: Linda Audio
rockamp-by-linda-audio.description: No specific hardware simulated, no advanced circuit emulation algorithms used - just tuned to sound good. It is useful for rock and for low to mid-gain sounds, but it is also capable of some high-gain tones.
rockamp-by-linda-audio.name: RockAmp

room-verb-hall-by-exe-consulting.author: EXE Consulting
room-verb-hall-by-exe-consulting.description: This rotational room modelling program solves the wave equation in 3-D spaces, here a specific large concert hall of volume 12,500 cubic meters (for 44,100 samples/sec*) with the "Golden Ratio" for its dimensions. This version allows rotation of the microphones around and around (equivalently the room about the microphones) at different speeds. Please see YouTube channel for EXE Consulting for introductory video. Please see SoundCloud for EXE Consulting for songs that employ this room modeller. VST2/VST3 again.
room-verb-hall-by-exe-consulting.name: Room Verb Hall

roomconvp-by-exe-consulting.author: EXE Consulting
roomconvp-by-exe-consulting.description: This room modelling program solves the wave equation in 3-D spaces, here a specific large concert hall of volume 12,500 cubic meters (for 44,100 samples/sec*) with the "Golden Ratio" for its dimensions. Please see YouTube channel for EXE Consulting for introductory video. Please see SoundCloud for EXE Consulting for songs that employ this room modeller. VST2/VST3 again.
roomconvp-by-exe-consulting.name: roomconvp

roomconvpbin-by-exe-consulting.author: EXE Consulting
roomconvpbin-by-exe-consulting.description: Binaural version of room acoustics modelling program RoomConvp. Used for headphone mixing. Binaural examples of mixing are available at SoundCloud under EXE Consulting.
roomconvpbin-by-exe-consulting.name: roomconvpbin

rough-rider-by-audio-damage.author: Audio Damage
rough-rider-by-audio-damage.description: Rough Rider is a modern compressor with a bit of "vintage"-style bite and a uniquely warm sound. Perfect for adding compression effects to your drum buss, it also sounds great with synth bass, clean guitar, and backing vocals. Definitely not an all-purpose compressor, Rough Rider is at its best when used to add pump to rhythmic tracks. Of course, you can use it however you'd like. The Compressor Police aren't gonna come to your house and give you a citation. Slap it on a track and crank some knobs.
rough-rider-by-audio-damage.name: Rough Rider

rs-w2395c-free-neo-classic-baxandall-eq-.author: Fuse Audio Labs
rs-w2395c-free-neo-classic-baxandall-eq-.name: RS-W2395C free Neo Classic Baxandall EQ

sampledelay-by-bluelab-audio-plugins.author: BlueLab | Audio Plugins
sampledelay-by-bluelab-audio-plugins.description: SampleDelay is a plugin that simply applies a short delay to a track. It has a precision at the level of one sample. It is more designed to be used as a utility than to be used to make an effect.
sampledelay-by-bluelab-audio-plugins.name: SampleDelay

sampletank-4-cs-by-ik-multimedia.author: IK Multimedia
sampletank-4-cs-by-ik-multimedia.description: SampleTank 4 Custom Shop is your introduction to the power of the new SampleTank 4 sound and groove creation workstation. Combining all the features of SampleTank 4's award-winning sound engine with 50 all-new instruments and 200 MIDI loops, SampleTank 4 CS gives you the power to create full tracks in a single plug-in, then expand your sonic arsenal as needed.
sampletank-4-cs-by-ik-multimedia.name: SampleTank 4 CS

sampletank-custom-shop-by-ik-multimedia.description: Now allows import ("Powered by SampleTank" libraries and user samples) and editing! - updated April 19, 2016.

saxophones-by-freemusicproduction-net.name: Saxophones

se-polymod-kx-by-kx77free.author: KX77FREE

setechave-by-audiofb.author: AudioFB
setechave-by-audiofb.description: Mono/Stereo "pumper" compressor, indicated for use in tracks that require beyond dynamic range control, also "punch":

sforzando-by-plogue.author: Plogue
sforzando-by-plogue.description: sforzando is a free SFZ player. Advanced sample hobbyists now have a powerful tool to experiment and share instruments without relying on proprietary formats.

snarebuzz-by-wavesfactory.author: Wavesfactory
snarebuzz-by-wavesfactory.description: SnareBuzz is an audio effect plugin that emulates the wires of a snare buzzing when there's another instrument playing near.
snarebuzz-by-wavesfactory.name: SnareBuzz

soneq-by-sonimus.author: Sonimus
soneq-by-sonimus.description: SonEQ is a digital equalizer that takes parts from some vintage gear and combines them. SonEQ has 3 bands, bass, middle and treble. Also, SonEQ has a pre-amp section.
soneq-by-sonimus.name: SonEQ

soprano-jug-drum-by-embertone.author: Embertone
soprano-jug-drum-by-embertone.description: What happens when you lock two sound designers in a space with 5 water jugs, 5 microphones, a laptop and an audio interface? Pure #$!@ing magic, that's what! With oodles of round robins, 4 different playing styles, and a dynamic range equipped to shake things up, you're going to love this instrumentâ€¦ It's a new angle on the concept of "epic drumming"
soprano-jug-drum-by-embertone.name: Soprano Jug Drum

sound-delay-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
sound-delay-by-voxengo.description: Sound Delay is an auxiliary multi-channel signal delaying plug-in. In Sound Delay, you may specify delay time in both milliseconds and samples, with a high level of precision. This plug-in - being technical - provides a basic signal delaying function only, without signal feedback or modulation capabilities.
sound-delay-by-voxengo.name: Sound Delay

sound-gadgets-by-reflekt-audio.author: Reflekt Audio
sound-gadgets-by-reflekt-audio.description: Reflekt Audio has created a plugin for producers and music makers everywhere. We are proud to present you all with the Sound Gadgets plugin.

soundbridge-daw-by-soundbridge.author: SoundBridge
soundbridge-daw-by-soundbridge.description: We designed SoundBridge with one thing in mind – simplicity.

soundbytes-ddmf-iieq-pro-by-soundbytes-m.author: SoundBytes Music Magazine / DDMF
soundbytes-ddmf-iieq-pro-by-soundbytes-m.description: SoundBytes DDMf IIEQ Pro is a six band equalizer from DDMf.

spacelifter-2-by-fanan-team.author: Fanan Team
spacelifter-2-by-fanan-team.description: Spacelifter 2 is a new concept of modular space echo-reverb effect that combines 5 top crafted spacing modules: most aggressive duration, capacity and echo modules connected in parallel, master modulation effect, side-chaining and a ping pong panning effect for each of the spacing modules. Spacelifter 2 can perfectly mix any kind of audio source, from drums to vocals and add some exiting panning and modulation joys to your mix.
spacelifter-2-by-fanan-team.name: Spacelifter 2

spaceport-77-for-sampletank-4-by-ik-mult.author: IK Multimedia
spaceport-77-for-sampletank-4-by-ik-mult.description: Expand your sound collection with two iconic synthesizers from long, long ago, to create sounds far, far away from the ordinary. The new Spaceport '77 Collection welcomes two familiar keyboard characters, the OB-1 and CP-30 to give your tracks some '70s and '80s sci-fi flavor.
spaceport-77-for-sampletank-4-by-ik-mult.name: SpacePort '77 for SampleTank 4

span-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
span-by-voxengo.description: SPAN is a real-time "fast Fourier transform" audio spectrum analyzer plug-in for professional music and audio production applications. For the most part it was derived from Voxengo GlissEQ dynamic parametric equalizer and reproduces its spectrum analysis functionality.
span-by-voxengo.name: SPAN

spectrumanalyzer-by-sir-audio-tools.author: SIR Audio Tools
spectrumanalyzer-by-sir-audio-tools.description: SpectrumAnalyzer is a spectrum analyzer plugin that offers a lot of opportunities to display the spectral content of your audio material, which helps you create a better mix. SpectrumAnalyzer comes in two editions, a free and a full version.
spectrumanalyzer-by-sir-audio-tools.name: SpectrumAnalyzer

speculumfree-by-decade-bridge.author: Decade Bridge
speculumfree-by-decade-bridge.description: Speculumfree is a delay/comb filter effect plugin.

sphere-by-sonicbits.author: Sonicbits
sphere-by-sonicbits.description: Sphere is an easy to use and free reverb plugin that can add depth and live to any sound material. The reverb is based on a modified Schroeder reverberator with added predelay and supports stereo channels only. The plugin UI has been created using vector graphics and supports blur free resizing.
sphere-by-sonicbits.name: Sphere

spl-free-ranger-by-plugin-alliance.author: Plugin Alliance / SPL
spl-free-ranger-by-plugin-alliance.description: The Free Ranger is based upon the Full Ranger-EQ from our EQ Rangers series. It is limited to four – we think very useful – bands:
spl-free-ranger-by-plugin-alliance.name: SPL Free Ranger

sq8rom-by-samplescience.author: SampleScience
sq8rom-by-samplescience.description: SQ8ROM is a sampled version of SQ8L, a VST plugin based on the sound and synthesizer architecture of the Ensoniq SQ80. SQ8ROM comes with 50 sounds, the remaining sounds are available as free expansions for a total of 168 sounds. SQ8ROM is a must-have if you produce synthwave, synth-pop, vaporwave, and any other 80s influenced genres.
sq8rom-by-samplescience.name: SQ8ROM

squashit-by-klevgr-nd-produktion.author: Klevgränd Produktion
squashit-by-klevgr-nd-produktion.description: SquashIt is a multi-band distortion effect available for iOS (AudioBus 2 compatible including state saving) and as VST/AU (Mac/Windows). The effect has proven to work very well with vocals and bass.
squashit-by-klevgr-nd-produktion.name: SquashIt

squeezer-by-mzuther.author: mzuther

squeezer-by-mzuther.name: Squeezer

stein-d-grand-by-sonex-audio.author: Sonex Audio
stein-d-grand-by-sonex-audio.description: Sonex Audio has released Free Stein D Grand, an massive 6.3 GB Steinway D Acoustic Piano for NI Kontakt Sampler.
stein-d-grand-by-sonex-audio.name: Stein D Grand

stereo-helper-by-press-play.author: Press Play
stereo-helper-by-press-play.description: Stereo Helper is an audio effect plugin for stereo mix control. It can be used on every audio track/group that requires stereophonic enhancement. It's leightweight in terms of CPU power consumption and has zero latency. The main features include mid/side processing, width control, stereo enhancement and a mono compatibility checker.
stereo-helper-by-press-play.name: Stereo Helper

stereo-swapper-by-raising-jake-studios.author: Raising Jake Studios
stereo-swapper-by-raising-jake-studios.description: Stereo Swapper is a simple utility plugin that can help make better mix decisions. Stereo Swapper quicky "swaps" the left and right channels in any stereo monitor bus, mix bus or stereo track to allow a new perspective of the stereo image when flipped left/right. Stereo Swapper also includes a Mono button for quick referencing of the track in mono.
stereo-swapper-by-raising-jake-studios.name: Stereo Swapper

stereo-touch-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
stereo-touch-by-voxengo.description: Stereo Touch can be used to add stereo width to audio tracks. This plug-in is most effective on mono pad sounds and alike. This effect works with mono stream generating stereo stream. It also works with stereo streams, however both channels get processed independently of each other like they are mono streams and then two resulting stereo streams get mixed together to produce one stereo stream.
stereo-touch-by-voxengo.name: Stereo Touch

stereopan-by-bluelab-audio-plugins.author: BlueLab | Audio Plugins
stereopan-by-bluelab-audio-plugins.description: The StereoPan plugin sets the panning of a stereo track for each of the two channels independently.
stereopan-by-bluelab-audio-plugins.name: StereoPan

stilt-by-tbproaudio.author: TBProAudio
stilt-by-tbproaudio.description: sTilt is a linear phase filter which tilts the audio spectrum around a given center frequency.
stilt-by-tbproaudio.name: sTilt

stringya-2-by-fanan-team.author: Fanan Team
stringya-2-by-fanan-team.description: Stringya 2 is a tiny size virtual analog electronic strings machine and the successor of Stringya, that works in an open mixer format and enhanced with some new exciting features. First, an improved 3 32-bit top quality waveform engine with incredibly high dynamic range oscillators to generate 3 electronic strings emulation, each with it's own size and color. All the 3 oscillators can be mixed together into a full strings ensemble, allowing the player creating beautiful chords, string sound combinations, articulations and textures, since Stringya 2's oscillators has full synthesis section, 2 different MIDI velocity options, stereo enhancer engine, new gleam effect, a user friendly global hipass-lopass filter and a full section of built in effects (saturation, chorus, phaser, trance gate, reverb and delay), advanced mono mode and dedicated organs alike draw-bars system.
stringya-2-by-fanan-team.name: Stringya 2

subspace-by-zynaptiq.author: Zynaptiq

superspread-by-lkjb.description: SuperSpread uses multiple pitch shifters to spread a signal thus allowing supersawing any input it is given.

svep-by-klevgr-nd-produktion.description: Svep is a stereo modulation filter effect suitable for any sound. All parameters are easily editable in one screen and the clean and responsive user interface encourages creativity. Tweak it to produce anything from old-school phasers to subtle choruses.
