synth-w-by-freemusicproduction-net.description: Synth W is a free Wavetable Synth that includes:
synth-w-by-freemusicproduction-net.name: Synth W

synthetic-vortices-plugin-edition-by-sam.author: SampleScience
synthetic-vortices-plugin-edition-by-sam.description: Synthetic Vortices [Plugin Edition] is a collection of 90 ambient loops generated by the Ensoniq Fizmo and embedded in a VST/VST3/AU plugin instrument. The collection of sounds is atmospheric and alien, perfect to create the sound bed of a science fiction movie or a documentary about space lifeforms.
synthetic-vortices-plugin-edition-by-sam.name: Synthetic Vortices [Plugin Edition]

synthetik-by-tru-urban.author: Tru-Urban
synthetik-by-tru-urban.description: Synthetik is a free VST and AU plugin delivering fresh inspiring sounds and FX for Hip-Hop and R&B productions including synths, bells, synth bass, brass, electric pianos, pads, strings and more.
synthetik-by-tru-urban.name: Synthetik

syntronik-by-ik-multimedia.author: IK Multimedia
syntronik-by-ik-multimedia.description: Syntronik is a cutting-edge virtual synthesizer that raises the bar in sound quality and flexibility thanks to the most advanced sampling techniques combined with a new hybrid sample and modeling synthesis engine. Syntronik includes 17 amazing instruments, available as a collection or separately, with over 2,000 preset sounds covering a wide selection from 38 of the most iconic to ultra-rare and painstakingly multi-sampled vintage synthesizers. Syntronik's synthesis engine goes well beyond traditional sampling thanks to a brand new analog modeled filter section created with the utmost expertise from IK, the pioneer in virtual circuit modeling. This is coupled with exclusive DRIFT technology to accurately reproduce the behavior of oscillators from real hardware synths. All of this combined with an effects section that is unrivaled in the world of virtual instruments along with advanced features like 4-part layers, splits and arpeggiators make Syntronik the ultimate source of inspiration with the widest palette of synthesizer sounds ranging from exact reproductions of the originals to sounds never heard before that will stand out from the crowd in productions covering any genre and style.
syntronik-by-ik-multimedia.name: Syntronik

t-chain-by-lvc-audio.author: LVC-Audio
t-chain-by-lvc-audio.description: T-Chain is a versatile channel strip plugin, designed to be used in a variety of situations. It utilizes a modular design so users can arrange different sound modules within the signal path. It can be as simple as using a single EQ or Compressor module, or as complex as you can imagine. Each module can be rearranged, added, and deleted by drag-and-drop.
t-chain-by-lvc-audio.name: T-Chain

t-force-alpha-plus-2-by-mastrcode-music.author: Mastrcode Music
t-force-alpha-plus-2-by-mastrcode-music.description: Mastrcode Music has released T-Force Alpha Plus 2 - VSTi for Windows.
t-force-alpha-plus-2-by-mastrcode-music.name: T-Force Alpha Plus 2

t-rex-1982-by-max-project.author: Max Project
t-rex-1982-by-max-project.description: T.Rex 1982 is the latest virtual instrument from Max Project designed in collaboration with producer Lic. Ezequiel Morfi (TITANIO, Buenos Aires, Argentina) - both have travelled through space and time in search of a special treatment for the original sounds from a "LinnDrum " rhythm machine possessing the 'retro' touch of the original patches while at the time sounding modern and up-to-date due to a 64-bit floating-point 'mastering' process with the latest in DSP. T.Rex 1982 will specially deliver in the new retrowave, vaporwave and synthwave genres.
t-rex-1982-by-max-project.name: T.Rex 1982

taganing-batak-by-artsonica.author: ArtSonica
taganing-batak-by-artsonica.description: We just released our 1st virtual instrument, #TaganingBatakVST, a set of fine-tuned ethnic drums from Toba of Sumatra, Indonesia.
taganing-batak-by-artsonica.name: Taganing Batak

tal-filter-ii-by-togu-audio-line.author: Togu Audio Line
tal-filter-ii-by-togu-audio-line.description: TAL-Filter-2 is a host-synced filter module with different filter types, panorama and volume modulation possibilities.
tal-filter-ii-by-togu-audio-line.name: TAL-Filter II

tal-noisemaker-by-togu-audio-line.author: Togu Audio Line
tal-noisemaker-by-togu-audio-line.description: TAL-NoiseMaker is an improved version of TAL-Elek7ro and has a completely new synth engine and a lot of improvements in sound and usability. The synth also includes a small effect section with a reverb, chorus and a simple bit-crusher effect.
tal-noisemaker-by-togu-audio-line.name: TAL-NoiseMaker

tal-reverb-4-by-togu-audio-line.author: Togu Audio Line
tal-reverb-4-by-togu-audio-line.description: TAL-Reverb-4 is a standalone version of the high quality reverb implemented in TAL-Sampler.
tal-reverb-4-by-togu-audio-line.name: TAL-Reverb-4

tal-reverb-iii-by-togu-audio-line.author: Togu Audio Line
tal-reverb-iii-by-togu-audio-line.description: TAL-Reverb-III is an easy-to-use stereo plate plug-in. It's the replacement for TAL-Reverb-II and has several improvements such as an optimized GUI and some changes in the reverb algorithm. It has a simplified EQ section, a meter display and shows actual slider values. The reverb has its own character and produces a very diffuse plate. TAL tried to create a colorless and maximal diffuse plate reverb without grains and digital artifacts. It's the result of a lot tuning and testing.
tal-reverb-iii-by-togu-audio-line.name: TAL-Reverb III

tal-vocoder-by-togu-audio-line.author: Togu Audio Line
tal-vocoder-by-togu-audio-line.description: TAL-Vocoder is a vintage vocoder emulation with 11 bands that emulates the sound of vocoders from the early 80s. It includes analog-modeled components in combination with digital algorithms such as the SFFT (Short-Time Fast Fourier Transform). It includes an envelope follower for each of the eleven bands.
tal-vocoder-by-togu-audio-line.name: TAL-Vocoder

tape-bus-by-gbsoundlab.author: GBSoundlab
tape-bus-by-gbsoundlab.description: Tape Bus, recreates the behavior of hardware circuitry when subjected to work in the non-linear or saturation zone.
tape-bus-by-gbsoundlab.name: Tape Bus

tdr-kotelnikov-by-tokyo-dawn-labs.author: Tokyo Dawn Labs
tdr-kotelnikov-by-tokyo-dawn-labs.description: TDR Kotelnikov is a wideband dynamics processor combining high fidelity dynamic range control with deep musical flexibility. As a descendant of the venerable TDR Feedback Compressor product family, Kotelnikov has directly inherited several unique features such as a proven control scheme, individual release control for peak and RMS content, an intuitive user interface, and powerful, state of the art, high-precision algorithms.
tdr-kotelnikov-by-tokyo-dawn-labs.name: TDR Kotelnikov

tdr-nova-by-tokyo-dawn-labs.author: Tokyo Dawn Labs
tdr-nova-by-tokyo-dawn-labs.description: TDR NOVA is a parallel dynamic equalizer. Appearing in the familiar layout of a parametric equalizer, each band also includes a full featured dynamics section allowing the processor to cover an impressively wide range of applications. Be it a master lacking density, the drum bus asking for more crispiness, or a sibilance problem in your perfect take: NOVA has an elegant answer.
tdr-nova-by-tokyo-dawn-labs.name: TDR Nova

tdr-vos-slickeq-by-tokyo-dawn-labs.author: Tokyo Dawn Labs / Variety Of Sound
tdr-vos-slickeq-by-tokyo-dawn-labs.description: TDR VOS SlickEQ is a mixing/mastering equalizer designed for ease of use, musical flexibility and impeccable sound.
tdr-vos-slickeq-by-tokyo-dawn-labs.name: TDR VOS SlickEQ

temper-by-creative-intent.author: Creative Intent
temper-by-creative-intent.description: Temper is a modern digital distortion plugin which combines a rich saturation curve and a unique phase distortion, with a resonant lowpass filter at the beginning of the signal chain and a feedback loop through the distortion stage.
temper-by-creative-intent.name: Temper

tempo-delay-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
tempo-delay-by-voxengo.description: Tempo Delay is based on tempo, incorporating filter and tremolo sections with separate controls for each stereo channel. Instead of a single "delay length" control this plug-in features separate "delay", "repetition period" and "delay panning" controls which allow the user to create an even sounding "ping-pong" stereo echoes.
tempo-delay-by-voxengo.name: Tempo Delay

the-anvil-by-ignite-amps.author: Ignite Amps
the-anvil-by-ignite-amps.description: The Anvil is a digital emulation of a three channels tube preamplifier for guitar. It has been developed to accurately model its real hardware counterpart, designed by Andy Zeugs.
the-anvil-by-ignite-amps.name: The Anvil

the-fattener-by-lee-scott.author: Lee Scott
the-fattener-by-lee-scott.description: This VST plugin creates a typical fattening effect to an audio signal.
the-fattener-by-lee-scott.name: The fattener

the-great-escape-by-musical-entropy.author: Musical Entropy
the-great-escape-by-musical-entropy.description: The Great Escape is a dynamic tremolo plug-in, made in collaboration with the french company Thrilltone and modeling their original analog pedal with the same name. It features an envelope detector which changes the speed and the depth of the effect with your playing.
the-great-escape-by-musical-entropy.name: The Great Escape

the-haunted-toy-by-make-some-music-now.author: make some music now!
the-haunted-toy-by-make-some-music-now.description: This is a funny and free virtual instrument, created for the KVR Developers Challenge 2018.
the-haunted-toy-by-make-some-music-now.name: The Haunted Toy

the-kitchen-by-embertone.author: Embertone
the-kitchen-by-embertone.description: Embertone's "The Kitchen" is little gem that was a SCOREcast exclusive for a few weeks, but now it's broken out for the rest of the world… Enjoy the sound of oven slams, glass bowls, kitchen lamps, matchsticks and more. We're keeping it weird, people. And we're proud to be a part of the SCOREcast community! If you don't know about SCOREcast, well, you should.
the-kitchen-by-embertone.name: The Kitchen

throb-by-shaduzlabs.author: shaduzLABS
throb-by-shaduzlabs.description: Throb is a free and open source plugin that generates clock/reset signals synchronised with the host tempo. It is currently available for Windows (VST2 and VST3, 32/64-bit) and OS X (VST2, VST3 and AU 32/64-bit). The multiplier is an automation parameter and therefore can be controlled using the respective host functionality. Both the multiplier and the resolution (ppqn) settings are serialized to the preset chunk.
throb-by-shaduzlabs.name: Throb

tinyq-by-lkjb.author: lkjb
tinyq-by-lkjb.description: TinyQ is - as the name suggests - a rather tiny EQ. There are lots of good large EQs around but nothing versatile if simply a few adjustments are needed. The EQ provides the following features:
tinyq-by-lkjb.name: TinyQ

toned-by-lvc-audio.author: LVC-Audio
toned-by-lvc-audio.description: Toned is a specialized tone shaping plugin with analog modeling. It is designed primarily for use in the mastering process or on two-track audio busses. Toned uses two distinct equalization processes: a three-band tone-shaping matrix, and a specially designed high pass (HP) filter.
toned-by-lvc-audio.name: Toned

tonedeluxe-by-lostin70s.author: lostin70's
tonedeluxe-by-lostin70s.description: The ToneDeluxe is designed as a full analog tube amplifier from preamp stage to cabinet. Based on ECC83 and EL34 tubes, its analog time model design allows to reduce the delay of the signal processing and thus give a "pleasure of playing" for guitarists. It offers two independent channels : clean and high gain. The high gain chanel is versatile thanks to the DriveTone setting that cut/boost high frequency before the tone stack.
tonedeluxe-by-lostin70s.name: ToneDeluxe

tonedeluxe-version-2-by-lostin70s.author: lostin70's
tonedeluxe-version-2-by-lostin70s.name: ToneDeluxe Version 2
tags: Guitar Amp Sim and FX Modeling

toy-keyboard-v2-by-samplescience.author: SampleScience
toy-keyboard-v2-by-samplescience.description: Toy Keyboard is a free VST/VST3/AU plugin instrument and sample library featuring the sound of the Yamaha PSR-78 home keyboard. All the sounds have been sampled and looped when appropriate. To keep the plugin light, each sound contains only one sample stretched over the keyboard.
toy-keyboard-v2-by-samplescience.name: Toy Keyboard v2

trakmeter-by-mzuther.author: mzuther
trakmeter-by-mzuther.description: traKmeter is a loudness meter for correctly setting up tracking and mixing levels.
trakmeter-by-mzuther.name: traKmeter

transient-by-audio-assault.author: Audio Assault
transient-by-audio-assault.description: Audio Assault Transient is a free envelope shaper plug-in.
transient-by-audio-assault.name: Transient

traveller-by-sever-k.author: Severák
traveller-by-sever-k.description: Traveller is a monophonic synth inspired by Korg Synthe-Bass and its overall simplicity.
traveller-by-sever-k.name: Traveller

triple-cheese-by-u-he.author: u-he
triple-cheese-by-u-he.description: Winner of the KVR Developer Challenge 2006, Triple Cheese is a unique-sounding freeware synthesizer plug-in.
triple-cheese-by-u-he.name: Triple Cheese

triple-eq-by-blue-cat-audio.author: Blue Cat Audio
triple-eq-by-blue-cat-audio.description: Blue Cat's Triple EQ is an easy-to-use 3-band semi-parametric equalizer. It includes a low shelf filter, a high shelf filter and a boost/cut peak filter. Its wide range of gain (+/-40 dB per band) and bandwidth (.01 to 5 Octave) makes it very versatile. The three filters are linked together so that when you change the center frequency or the bandwidth, the three filter parameters are changed accordingly: you can change the entire equalizer characteristics with one single mouse click making any equalization task very easy and intuitive.
triple-eq-by-blue-cat-audio.name: Triple EQ

tropical-house-flute-by-freemusicproduct.author: Freemusicproduction.net
tropical-house-flute-by-freemusicproduct.description: Tropical House Flute is free preset for free instrument HALion Sonic SE.
tropical-house-flute-by-freemusicproduct.name: Tropical House Flute

tube-amp-by-voxengo.author: Voxengo
tube-amp-by-voxengo.description: Tube Amp is an audio effect plug-in that applies asymmetric tube triode overdrive usually found in single-tube microphone pre-amp boxes. The sound this plug-in produces varies from a mild "warm" overdrive to a fuzzy distortion. Beside that, Tube Amp includes a -6 dB/oct low-pass filter that is built-in into plug-in's valve modeling equation, and can be used to imitate a lower-quality tube triode.
tube-amp-by-voxengo.name: Tube Amp

tube-saturator-vintage-by-wave-arts.author: Wave Arts
tube-saturator-vintage-by-wave-arts.description: Tube Saturator Vintage is a free reissue of the original Tube Saturator.
tube-saturator-vintage-by-wave-arts.name: Tube Saturator Vintage

tunefish-4-by-brain-control.author: Brain Control
tunefish-4-by-brain-control.description: Tunefish 4 was developed as a smaller replacement of Tunefish 3 with roughly the same power, it is however not compatible and uses different synthesis algorithms. It was developed for the 64k intro "Turtles all the way down" by demoscene group Brain Control and is available as VST/AU.
tunefish-4-by-brain-control.name: Tunefish 4

twin-reeler-by-klotoid-audio-effects.author: KLOTOID Audio Effects
twin-reeler-by-klotoid-audio-effects.description: The Twin Reeler is a modulation effect, producing a reeling stereo vibrato by twisting the time scale with a different modulation function on each output channel. The plugin can be used as a simple vibrato on a mono signal path, add space to mono-to-stereo signals with moderate parameter settings, or create lurching chaos by turning the knobs up.
twin-reeler-by-klotoid-audio-effects.name: Twin Reeler

tx16wx-software-sampler-by-cwitec.author: CWITEC
tx16wx-software-sampler-by-cwitec.description: TX16Wx Software Sampler is a sampler plug-in with professional features and an easy to use graphical interface. Built to mimic the best aspects of hardware samplers, but with the quick and easy operation of modern software. An instrument not for preset players, but people who enjoy making, tweaking and playing their own samples.
tx16wx-software-sampler-by-cwitec.name: TX16Wx Software Sampler

tx2sfz-by-derknott.author: derknott
tx2sfz-by-derknott.description: Converter for the sampler TX16WX. So you can convert the basic structure to the open sfz format.
tx2sfz-by-derknott.name: TX2SFZ

tyrell-nexus-6-by-u-he.author: u-he / Amazona.de
tyrell-nexus-6-by-u-he.description: The Tyrell Nexus 6 plug-in was programmed by Urs Heckmann (mastermind of u-he) for Amazona.de. This is a virtual analog software synthesizer: the sound engine is circuit-modeled and is similar to the u-he "ACE". The features are those that we may expect from a vintage synthesizer like the Juno series from Roland.
tyrell-nexus-6-by-u-he.name: Tyrell Nexus 6

uhg2amp-by-exe-consulting.author: EXE Consulting
uhg2amp-by-exe-consulting.description: 64-bit ultra-high-gain guitar amp simulator for Windows. Please see YouTube channel for EXE Consulting for introductory video. Please see SoundCloud for EXE Consulting for songs that employ this amp simulator. VST2/VST3 again.
uhg2amp-by-exe-consulting.name: UHG2Amp

uno-synth-editor-by-ik-multimedia.author: IK Multimedia
uno-synth-editor-by-ik-multimedia.description: The UNO Synth Editor is a plug-in and standalone app that lets you access all the parameters of IK's groundbreaking UNO Synth, the real analog synthesizer for everyone. The Editor lets you go beyond the front panel controls and access deeper programming settings like full 4-stage ADSR envelopes for both filter and amplitude, pulse width and waveform shape modulation of the oscillators, modulation wheel assignments, velocity control and much more. The Editor does not make sound on its own. Rather, it is a controller for the UNO Synth hardware that gives you remote control of this innovative instrument from your computer or mobile device.
uno-synth-editor-by-ik-multimedia.name: UNO Synth Editor

upright-piano-by-99sounds.author: 99Sounds
upright-piano-by-99sounds.description: Upright Piano is a freeware piano virtual instrument. It is based on a set of upright piano samples recorded by Rudi Fiasco. The instrument features four sampled notes per octave and six velocity layers per sampled note. The samples were recorded in stereo. Key release samples are also included.
upright-piano-by-99sounds.name: Upright Piano

vandelay-multiband-echo-device-by-klevgr.author: Klevgränd Produktion
vandelay-multiband-echo-device-by-klevgr.description: Vandelay is a multi-band delay effect with a modulation feature on each frequency band available for iPad (AudioBus 2 compatible including state saving) and as a AU/VST plugin.
vandelay-multiband-echo-device-by-klevgr.name: Vandelay multiband echo device

verberate-basic-by-acon-digital.author: Acon Digital
verberate-basic-by-acon-digital.description: The Revolutionary Vivid Hall Algorithm for Free
verberate-basic-by-acon-digital.name: Verberate Basic

vienna-ensemble-by-vienna-symphonic-libr.author: Vienna Symphonic Library (VSL)
vienna-ensemble-by-vienna-symphonic-libr.description: Vienna Ensemble is a free mixing and host software application that is automatically installed with Vienna Instruments. It is available for all registered Vienna Instruments users.
vienna-ensemble-by-vienna-symphonic-libr.name: Vienna Ensemble

vintage-marching-snare-roll-by-rdgaudio.author: RDGAudio
vintage-marching-snare-roll-by-rdgaudio.description: Vintage Marching Snare Roll is our Free gift to you.
vintage-marching-snare-roll-by-rdgaudio.name: Vintage Marching Snare Roll

vinyl-by-izotope-inc.author: iZotope
vinyl-by-izotope-inc.description: iZotope Vinyl is the ultimate lo-fi weapon, it uses 64-bit processing and advanced filtering, modeling and resampling to create authentic "vinyl" simulation, as if the audio was a record being played on a record player.
vinyl-by-izotope-inc.name: Vinyl

violins-by-freemusicproduction-net.author: Freemusicproduction.net
violins-by-freemusicproduction-net.description: Violins -13 types of violins with total control:
violins-by-freemusicproduction-net.name: Violins

viva-by-reflekt-audio.author: Reflekt Audio
viva-by-reflekt-audio.description: Viva is a festively unique sounding plugin for windows and mac that contains a hand full of unique sounds. Viva has some flutes, bells, tambourines, shakere's, and more.
viva-by-reflekt-audio.name: Viva

vocal-reverb-by-devil-soundz.author: Devil Soundz
vocal-reverb-by-devil-soundz.description: Vocal Reverb works seamlessly with your vocals. Vocal Reverb has that perfect ambiance, tone and harmonics to match your vocals whether you have a real deep voice to a really high voice. Vocal Reverb doesn't have any after tone (or tail) either. So you can program Vocal Reverb to sound just like your voice while Vocal Reverb adds just that right amount of ambiance, tone and harmonics to your vocals. Vocal Reverb if programmed correctly doesn't take away from how your voice actually sounds. Having Vocal Reverb on your vocals works seamlessly and perfect when played with your beats or songs. You can add just a little saturation or a medium amount of saturation depending on how you want your vocal tracks to sound but Vocal Reverb is not set to add to much saturation. With Vocal Reverb you should start by setting the vocal saturation which adds saturation to your vocals and cleans up unwanted artifacts and makes your vocals sound more clear and smooth. This is done before the reverb kicks in. Next you should turn the reverb up just about to the point where you can just hear the reverb saturation. Then use the reverb frequency selector and go through the selections till you get one that matches your voice. Then next I would play around with the frequency range and adjust it to match your voice. Start with setting the low end to not be deeper than what your voice gets. Then set the high end to where it makes the frequency range match your voice perfect. Then go back to the reverb and turn it up and down to adjust how much reverb saturation you want to have. To help out you can use the reverb saturation selector to add more or less reverb saturation. And finally adjust the width knob to add more fullness to your vocals. After you are done adjusting everything you will realize that your vocals are now more full and you will be able to hear more emotion and heart in your vocals. Then adjust the three band EQ till it soundz just like your voice.
vocal-reverb-by-devil-soundz.name: Vocal Reverb

vplayer-2-by-digital-brain-instruments.author: Digital Brain Instruments
vplayer-2-by-digital-brain-instruments.description: vPlayer 2 is a standalone software developed for quick testing new vst/au instruments without the need to use any DAW.
vplayer-2-by-digital-brain-instruments.name: vPlayer 2

vps-scope-by-vengeance-sound.author: Vengeance Sound
vps-scope-by-vengeance-sound.description: VPS Scope is an analyser plugin with scope, spectral and stereo analysis:
vps-scope-by-vengeance-sound.name: VPS Scope

vst-audio-plug-ins-sdk-c-and-and-by-stei.author: Steinberg
vst-audio-plug-ins-sdk-c-and-and-by-stei.description: Virtual Studio Technology (VST) is developed by Steinberg and first launched in 1996. The SDK/API is freely available to all.
vst-audio-plug-ins-sdk-c-and-and-by-stei.name: VST Audio Plug-ins SDK (C++)

vsthost-by-hermann-seib.author: Hermann Seib
vsthost-by-hermann-seib.description: VSTHost is an Open Source VST-compatible host that:
vsthost-by-hermann-seib.name: VSTHost

vststuff-by-beladaddy-software.author: BelaDaddy Software
vststuff-by-beladaddy-software.description: Play and record audio files, load VST effect plugins and connect these to the VSTStuff audio player.
vststuff-by-beladaddy-software.name: VSTStuff
tags: VST Host Audio Player Audio Recorder

w1-limiter-by-4front-technologies.author: 4Front Technologies
w1-limiter-by-4front-technologies.description: W1 Limiter is a "brickwall limiter" that is a clone of Waves L1-Ultramaximizer, with "identical output" and an approximation of Waves L2.
w1-limiter-by-4front-technologies.name: W1 Limiter

wallsofsound_by_fractone.author: Fractone
wallsofsound_by_fractone.description: The idea with the WallsOfSound plug-in is to emulate, in a way most general as possible, the reverberant effects of sound traveling from sources to receivers in a three-dimensional space - bounded, fully or partially, by walls of specified sonic reflectivity coefficients. Rather than control reverb and echo with the conventional knob or slider-driven, single-dimensional delay parameters and the like, reverberant effects would be created by actually creating a virtual room and laying out sources and receivers in the three dimensions - a more intuitive approach.
wallsofsound_by_fractone.name: WallsOfSound

wav3s-by-bluelab-audio-plugins.author: BlueLab | Audio Plugins
wav3s-by-bluelab-audio-plugins.description: BlueLab WAV3S is a plug-in that simply displays the sound in 3D. Several display modes are available, as well as parameters to adjust the display. The view can be easily manipulated using the mouse or the trackpad.
wav3s-by-bluelab-audio-plugins.name: WAV3S

wider-by-polyverse-music.author: Polyverse Music / Polyverse Music
wider-by-polyverse-music.description: World Famous electronic duo Infected Mushroom and Polyverse are proud to announce Wider, a unique stereo effect for free.
wider-by-polyverse-music.name: Wider

winkl-by-tekit-audio.author: Tek'it Audio
winkl-by-tekit-audio.description: Winkl is a free foldback distortion for VST2, VST3 and Audio Unit plug-in formats.
winkl-by-tekit-audio.name: Winkl

wusik-sp22-by-wusik.author: Wusik
wusik-sp22-by-wusik.description: Wusik SP22 is a Sample Recording App/Plugin (Standalone Application and VST2/VST3/AU Plugins) that allows you to sample/record, edit, loop, process and even playback the input audio.
wusik-sp22-by-wusik.name: Wusik SP22

x-eight-lite-by-thenatan.author: Thenatan
x-eight-lite-by-thenatan.description: X-Eight Lite is a free / feature-reduced version of Thenatan's 808 plugin X-Eight which features:
x-eight-lite-by-thenatan.name: X-Eight Lite

xs-707-by-12bitz.author: 12bitz
xs-707-by-12bitz.description: XS-707 is a rompler made out of a TR-707 kit sampled from an EMU EMAX 12 bit sampler.
xs-707-by-12bitz.name: XS-707

xtrack-eq32-by-soundoutthebox.author: SoundOutTheBox
xtrack-eq32-by-soundoutthebox.description: XTrack EQ32 is a VST / VST3 audio effect plugin which provides an equalizer 32 bands with a low CPU usage.
xtrack-eq32-by-soundoutthebox.name: XTrack EQ32

xylo-wood-by-reflekt-audio.author: Reflekt Audio
xylo-wood-by-reflekt-audio.description: The Xylo Wood VST Plugin was designed from a real authentic wooden xylophone which is located at a local museum. My daughter and I sampled it to bring to music makers across the globe an awesome free tool! The Xylo Wood consist of 3 different layers that we can dial in and blend each layer with one another to create a sick wooden xylophone sound. Xylo Wood also has some essential effects such as reverb, envelopes such as attack, decay sustain, and release. The Xylo Wood is a no brainer, get your copy today.
xylo-wood-by-reflekt-audio.name: Xylo Wood

ydp-grand-piano-by-freemusicproduction-n.author: Freemusicproduction.net
ydp-grand-piano-by-freemusicproduction-n.description: YDP Grand Piano (Yamaha Disklavier Pro Grand Piano) is soundfonts based instrument (.sf2).
ydp-grand-piano-by-freemusicproduction-n.name: YDP Grand Piano

yojo-by-reflekt-audio.author: Reflekt Audio
yojo-by-reflekt-audio.description: Reflekt Audio and Eumonik have worked together to bring you guys to bring music makers across the globe a 100% free VST plugin we like to call the "YoJo". The YoJo is a free virtual banjo instrument that consist of 4 layers that you can blend together to create a full and awesome banjo sound. Eumonik feels that banjo instruments should be used more outside of its respected classes, so here you all go.
yojo-by-reflekt-audio.name: YoJo

youlean-loudness-meter-by-youlean.author: Youlean
youlean-loudness-meter-by-youlean.description: Youlean Loudness Meter 2 is a successor of original loudness meter plugin that was KVR Developer Challenge 2016 winner.
youlean-loudness-meter-by-youlean.name: Youlean Loudness Meter

zebralette-by-u-he.author: u-he
zebralette-by-u-he.description: Zebralette is just one of Zebra2's oscillators packed into a simple, easy-to-learn framework – but you have everything you need to make some pretty amazing sounds. Sound that can be directly loaded into Zebra2 later. And should you eventually decide to upgrade to Zebra2, you will already know everything there is to know about the oscillators – which is quite an advantage.
zebralette-by-u-he.name: Zebralette
